body:
Fixes #6857.

- Generating the HTML from for >2300 packages from RST in Sphinx seems to
  take forever.
- Add an option to `spack list` to generate straight HTML instead.
- This reduces the doc build time to about a minute from over 5 minutes on my mac.

I'd really like to get rid of the package list altogether and have a searchable site for packages (like the brew formula page).  But that will take longer and this was an easy fix.
title: Speed up doc builds with spack list --format=html
